attributes.action: ,in the light of the loss of confidence in Parliament now widespread in the country, recommend to Her Majesty  the Queen that she dissolves the current Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a widespread lack of respect for and confidence in Members of Parliament of all parties as a result of the recent controversy over Parliamentary allowances and expense claims. It is becoming increasingly clear that this can only be addressed by dissolving the current Parliament and replacing it with a new one which reflects the current concerns of the electorate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
